body:
`Peek` is on the list of canonical methods in cmd/vet/methods.go.  A `Peek` method is normally expected to have the signature Peek(int) ([]byte, error), just like `Read` is expected to be `Read([]byte) (int, error)`.

So, I'm going to close this issue as working as expected.  Note that the warnings from vet are advisory.  Your code is likely still correct.
